name: Shady Mission
description:
Shady Mission survival horror game, look at video gameplay!

Instructions in game.

In a remote city a virus experiment has escaped and caused chaos and the city was cut off, explore the city and try to survive long enough to finish the mission... If you dare.

This is my first horror game, 3-4 game hours maybe more.

CPU: Minimum Dual core, recommended Quad core 

GFX CARD: Minimum Intel 600 series, recommended GTX 1050

Mac version is Intel and works with M1, you probably need to right click and choose open first time
